content: With respect, Bill: Lebron’s on/off differential (around +16) tells me that he wins question #1 as well. Harden’s is around +3, no? I agree that the differential should not be that much, what with Kyrie and Love on the team…but I think this speaks to the coach’s ability. You’re basically rewarding Harden for having a good coach and penalizing Lebron for having a bad one….but that’s what Coach of the Year is for.
